TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UserNamePasswordServiceCredential extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示此类用于配置服务如何对使用用户名/密码身份验证的用户进行身份验证，并可用于配置登录令牌的缓存。

span.span: Represents a class that is used to configure how the service authenticates users that use user name/password authentication and to configure the caching of logon tokens.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有配置服务所用的绑定，以进行基于用户名/密码的身份验证，则忽略此类的相关属性。If none of the bindings used by a service is configured for user name/password-based authentication, the relevant properties for this class are ignored. 这些属性包括 、、 和 属性。These properties include the , , , and properties. 如果没有配置服务所用的绑定，以使用 Windows 用户名/密码身份验证，则忽略与登录令牌的缓存相关的设置。If none of the bindings used by a service is configured to use Windows authentication for user name/password, the settings related to caching of logon tokens are ignored. 这些设置包括 、 和 属性。These settings include the , , and properties. ## Examples 下面的示例输出服务的 属性值。The following example prints the values of the properties for a service. The default is 15 minutes.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否缓存登录令牌。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether logon tokens are cached.

value.span: 如果缓存登录令牌，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if logon tokens are cached; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，如果用户名被映射到 Windows 帐户，则 WCF 安全会要求 Windows 安全子系统为每个传入用户名/密码安全令牌创建一个登录令牌。By default, WCF security asks the Windows security subsystem to create a logon token for every incoming user name/password security token if the user name is being mapped to a Windows account. 通过设置 属性，可以更改此行为。This behavior can be changed by setting the property. 对于 模式，服务使用 Win32 的 `LogonUser` 函数进行用户名/密码身份验证。For mode, the service uses Win32's `LogonUser` function for user name/password authentication. 如果 设置为 `true`，则将缓存生成的 Windows 令牌，并且对相同的用户名/密码对重用该令牌。If the is set to `true`, the resulting Windows token is cached and reused for the same user name/password pair. 缓存对 有效。The cache is valid for . 缓存的最大数目限制为 。The maximum number of caches is limited to . ## Examples 下面的示例获取该属性的值。The following example gets the value of this property. [!code-csharp[UserNamePasswordServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/usernamepasswordservicecredential/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UserNamePasswordServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/usernamepasswordservicecredential/vb/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置自定义用户名和密码验证程序。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom user name and password validator.

value.span: 自定义用户名和密码验证程序。

span.span: A custom user name and password validator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须设置为 ， 才能生效。The property must be set to for the to take effect. 如果 设置了属性且 属性不为，则 WCF 将使用 Windows 身份验证，并忽略属性的值 。When the property is set and the property is not, WCF uses Windows authentication and ignores the value of the property. 对于 模式，服务通过调用 方法，使用 进行用户名/密码身份验证。For mode, the service uses for user name/password authentication by calling the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 Windows 组是否包含在安全上下文中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Windows groups are included in the security context.

value.span: 如果 Windows 组包含在安全上下文中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if Windows groups are included in the security context; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大多数情况中，当验证 Windows 用户名和密码时，用户所属的 Windows 组会为授权决定提供有用信息。In most scenarios when validating Windows user names and passwords, Windows groups in which users belong provide useful information for authorization decisions. 但是，如果不需要 Windows 组，则将此属性设置为 `false` 可以通过避免全组声明填充提高性能。However, if the Windows groups are not required, setting this property to `false` can improve performance by avoiding a full-group claim population. ## Examples 下面的示例获取该属性的值。The following example gets the value of this property. [!code-csharp[UserNamePasswordServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/usernamepasswordservicecredential/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UserNamePasswordServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/usernamepasswordservicecredential/vb/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置成员资格提供程序。

span.span: Gets or sets the membership provider.
The for this service.
The default is the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 模式，服务通过调用 方法，使用 进行用户名/密码身份验证。For mode, the service uses for user name/password authentication by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 属性必须设置为 ， 才能生效。The property must be set to for the to take effect. 如果 设置了属性且 属性不为，则 WCF 将使用 Windows 身份验证，并忽略属性的值 。When the property is set and the property is not, WCF uses Windows authentication and ignores the value of the property. 如果将 属性设置为 `MembershipProvider`，但没有为 `MembershipProvider` 属性设置值，则默认为 类。If the property is set to `MembershipProvider` and the `MembershipProvider` property is not set to a value, the default is the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置验证用户名和密码的方法。

span.span: Gets or sets the method of validating the user name and password.
A value from the enumeration in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的值包括：Possible values are: - - - 如果将此属性设置为 ，则服务使用由 返回的对象来验证传入消息中的用户名和密码。If this property is set to , the service uses the object returned by to validate user names and passwords in incoming messages. > [!NOTE] > 当 WCF 服务承载于 Internet Information Services (使用传输级安全性的 IIS) ，并且属性设置为时 ，自定义身份验证方案将使用 Windows 身份验证的一个子集。When a WCF service is hosted in Internet Information Services (IIS) using transport-level security and the property is set to , the custom authentication scheme uses a subset of Windows authentication. 这是因为在这种情况下，IIS 将在 WCF 调用自定义验证器之前执行 Windows 身份验证。That is because in this scenario, IIS performs Windows authentication prior to WCF invoking the custom authenticator. 此属性值设置为 时，通过设置 属性来指定成员资格提供程序，然后由 属性指定的成员资格提供程序实例将用于验证传入消息中的用户名和密码。When the value of this property is set to , specify the membership provider by setting the property, and then the membership provider instance specified by the property is used to validate the username and password in incoming messages. ## Examples 下面的示例获取该属性的值。The following example gets the value of this property. [!code-csharp[UserNamePasswordServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/usernamepasswordservicecredential/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UserNamePasswordServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/usernamepasswordservicecredential/vb/source.vb#1)]
